channel.title: Tell me what you think of my site?

item.title: Tell me what you think of my site?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

If you still care. You have 22 errors remaining, and 90% of them are errors in just using &. Change all the & in your links to this..

&

Example:

http://www.bigfish58.com/cgi-bin/anyboard.cgi?pvp=main/&cmd=retr&vf=aW5kZXguaHRtbA%3D%3D

Makes the same effect but it loads faster since it's easier to parse. But all those bug fixes I made on your front page made your page load about 10x faster lol. Before it was so laggy.

~Ron

Read full topic

item.source: Tell me what you think of my site?

item.title: Tell me what you think of my site?
item.dc:creator: @bigfish58 bigfish58
item.description:
@bigfish58 wrote:

Ron:

I don't know if I'm a really nice guy or just bored. But I fixed most of your errors. The only errors left were the font tags were deprecated, td supposedly shouldn't have a background attribute (which is dumb), and your embed tag which doesn't have object tags around them.

I fixed...
- divs
- document type
- got rid of border=0 for the images cause you can do that in css by putting this code in
[code]
img {
border: 0;
}
[/code]
- alt attributes on images are always supposed to be there even if there is nothing in them
- a lot of empty tags
- i tree'd the code using dreamweaver
- and a bunch of other shit

Here is the code that should be for the first page. This will reduce lag and almost half the download time for your site.

Site: http://www.freepgs.com/goons/zzzzz.php.htm - Validate Link

Just right click and click on view source, just incase you don't know how to. lol :rolleyes: some people don't. Check the validation if you like too. I brought it down from over 80 errors to just 11. And those 11 are really small.

~Ron

Big up to every one for rating and commenting

And thanks Ron for that fix

Read full topic

item.title: Tell me what you think of my site?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

I don't know if I'm a really nice guy or just bored. But I fixed most of your errors. The only errors left were the font tags were deprecated, td supposedly shouldn't have a background attribute (which is dumb), and your embed tag which doesn't have object tags around them.

I fixed...
- divs
- document type
- got rid of border=0 for the images cause you can do that in css by putting this code in

img {
   border: 0;
}
  • alt attributes on images are always supposed to be there even if there is nothing in them
  • a lot of empty tags
  • i tree'd the code using dreamweaver
  • and a bunch of other shit

Here is the code that should be for the first page. This will reduce lag and almost half the download time for your site.

Site: http://www.freepgs.com/goons/zzzzz.php.htm - Validate Link

Just right click and click on view source, just incase you don't know how to. lol :rolleyes: some people don't. Check the validation if you like too. I brought it down from over 80 errors to just 11. And those 11 are really small.

~Ron

item.title: Tell me what you think of my site?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Yeah put your music at the top, and on default it should be turned off.

I suppose it's alright for friends and family though. But the majority of people do not like listening to music on websites(despite how tempted you may be to put it on). But its a nice clean site, and at least its not one of those piczo sites Good job.

item.description:
@Ron wrote:

No one finds my resolution lol. When I go to websites, it always shows up as Uknown or N/a or just blank. Then it says, How did I know? Click here to have your own image to show your friends what they have. Funny...

item.title: Tell me what you think of my site?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

It's a nice site for you and your friends definitely. Nice layout and style.

Has 86 validation errors man lol.
http://validator.w3.org/check?uri=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.bigfish58.com%2F

Please get rid of the song in the background. Listening to Led Zeppelin and some weirdo song on your site (no offense, I'm just goofing), is annoying.

http://www.bigfish58.com/dog.htm is messed up. Error in tables or server code I think.

Overall good job mate.

~Ron

Read full topic
